data.actual_result: Quick switcher animation shows 6 arrows and a message, but 4 of the arrows disappears and the message changes
data.expected_result: Quick switcher animation shows 6 arrows and a message
data.short_description: The animation when opening the quick switcher via the "Find or start a conversation" bar on the overlay changes after a few seconds
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable the overlay on a game (I used Limbo) - Launch the game - Open the overlay in game, and go to your direct messages list - Click on the "Find or start a conversation" bar and observe the animation of the quick switcher
